★ Release Notes: 2021-08-19 ★
≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡

Thanks for upgrading to the latest version of the ALKS CLI!

* adds support for custom authentication via a credential_process script
* alks-developer-login now asks for userId as well as password
* adds support for keychains in linux via the "keytar" node dependency
* adds warning regarding plaintext file storage of secrets when a keychain isn't found
* adds the --auth-type option to alks-developer-configure for specifying the desired auth mechanism in one line
* adds an auth type option that will have the CLI ask you for your password each time 

Have feedback? https://github.com/Cox-Automotive/ALKS-CLI/issues
 
☁☁☁☁☁☁  Happy Clouding! ☁☁☁☁☁☁
